src_original: tarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sāvadyasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo
katamad bhagavan sāvadyaṃ kāyakarma sāvadyaṃ vākkarma sāvadyaṃ manaskarma?
evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:  iha śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati,  katamaḥ sa kāyaḥ,  yena kāyena kāyakarma samārabheya,  katamā sā vāg,
yayā vākkarma samārabheya,  katamat tan manaḥ,
